item.description:
Storytellers wanted! Come tell your true, 5 minute stories of acceptance or be an avid listener  at

Gulu-Gulu Café  on 247 Essex Street in Salem, MA

on Sunday, June 24th from 5:30 to 8:30 p.m.

Art*Throb is teaming up with massmouth for an evening of true five-minute stories on the theme of acceptance .

Bring your stories of coming out or being accepted to grad school, by the cool kids or despite your overbite.

- The search for acceptance is universal.

 

Bring your storytelling talent, theater background, writing background, spoken word connection and/or interest to

The Gulu-Gulu Café

for Salem's first but not last,  story slam.

This is an off-season massmouth slam = Low on rules, high on fun!

group.name: CLOSING DOWN THIS MEETUP GROUP: massmouth storytellers

item.name: acceptance - Salem, MA Story Slam
